content.rendered:
Please complete the form below to schedule a complimentary consultation. This 20-minute phone call is for me to learn more about your concerns and for you to learn about my approach and to ask any questions you may have. At the end, we can decide if we’d like to move forward with scheduling an appointment in my office or online. If not, I will happily provide other referrals and point you in the right direction of what may be the most helpful for you and your concerns.

You may also contact me by phone to schedule a consultation. Please know that contacting me does not establish a therapeutic relationship.

This contact form should not be used for urgent or emergent psychological issues. If you need immediate help please call 911, visit your local ER, or use the crisis text-line (Text HOME to 741741).

Contacting me to ask about fees or insurance? Find the answers here.

By submitting this form via this web portal, you acknowledge and accept the risks of communicating your health information via this unencrypted email and electronic messaging and wish to continue despite those risks. By clicking "Yes, I want to submit this form" you agree to hold Brighter Vision harmless for unauthorized use, disclosure, or access of your protected health information sent via this electronic means.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Individual Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Individual Therapy for Adults Our work together will be customized to meet your specific needs and goals. Whether you are struggling with anxiety, stress, relationship problems, or managing difficult life changes, I will help you recognize underlying problems, fully realize your strengths and adjust certain behaviors and thoughts to see…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Contact
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Please use the form on this page to send a message. You may also contact me by phone. Please know that contacting me does not establish a therapeutic relationship. Phone: Location Information My office is located near downtown St. Petersburg. If you are interested in working with me but not…

jetpack-related-posts.title: About
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Nicole Archer, PsyD I became a Psychologist because of my love of connection.  I honor the relationships I build with my clients. Seeing them create new insights, use their strengths, and thrive; despite their challenges, keeps me excited about my work! I obtained my doctorate degree from the Florida Institute…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Online Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: My individual therapy services are also available online for Florida residents. Online therapy is convenient, effective, and confidential. I meet with my clients on a secure and HIPAA compliant platform (which feels similar to Skype or FaceTime). If you are comfortable with technology, have a good internet connection and a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: FAQs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I’m used to handling things on my own. Does seeing a therapist make me seem weak? No! Everyone needs help or support now and then. In fact, I think it takes courage to ask for help. You already have strengths that you’ve used before, but for whatever reason may struggle…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome! Do you find yourself frequently worried or anxious? Are you going through a big change (i.e. a break-up, divorce, new job, loss) that is causing increased stress or uncomfortable emotions? Life can be so difficult at times. Even the strongest people need a little bit of help to work…
